Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.model.powers

Class Power

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.model.powers.Power
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Mortal
public abstract class Power
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Used to connect the behaviour of the gods with the game

      public abstract java.util.List<Point> getBlockedMoves​(Player player, Worker worker, Game game)
      Gets the list of unavailable moves for the enemy worker
      Parameters:

      worker - worker to get blocked moves of
      game - current game
      Returns:
      list of blocked moves

      game - current game
      Returns:

      public abstract void undo()

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object o)
      Checks if another object is equal to this Only checks if the class is the same, and if the player is the same

      When choosing powers player is not set, so if both object player is null, the check is valid

      Overrides:
      equals in class java.lang.Object
      Parameters:

      Returns:
